Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui

Interface UI

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI
public interface UI
A generic user interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AbstractClientState getClientState​(ClientState clientState, Client client)
    Gets an instance of a UI-specific ClientState.
    AbstractClientTurnState getClientTurnState​(ClientTurnState clientTurnState, Client client)  
    void init​(java.lang.Runnable onExit)
    Initialize the user interface.
    default void notifyError​(java.lang.Exception ex)
    Displays an error on the user interface.
    void notifyError​(java.lang.String message)
    Displays an error on the user interface.
    default void notifyError​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Exception ex)
    Displays an error on the user interface.

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init​(java.lang.Runnable onExit)
      Initialize the user interface.
      Parameters:
      onExit - a Runnable that the UI must execute when the user requests to exit the program.

    • getClientState

      AbstractClientState getClientState​(ClientState clientState, Client client)
      Gets an instance of a UI-specific ClientState.
      Parameters:
      clientState - the requested client state
      client - the client
      Returns:
      an instance of a UI-specific ClientState

    • getClientTurnState

      AbstractClientTurnState getClientTurnState​(ClientTurnState clientTurnState, Client client)
      Parameters:
      clientTurnState - the requested client turn state
      client - the client
      Returns:
      an instance of a UI-specific ClientTurnState

    • notifyError

      void notifyError​(java.lang.String message)
      Displays an error on the user interface.
      Parameters:
      message - the error message

    • notifyError

      default void notifyError​(java.lang.Exception ex)
      Displays an error on the user interface. Please, be aware that this function is not intended to display debug messages to developers, but to render nicely-formatted error messages to the end user, hoping that they will be useful to her/him in order to identify what she/he did wrong.
      Parameters:
      ex - the exception

    • notifyError

      default void notifyError​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Exception ex)
      Displays an error on the user interface.
      Parameters:
      message - the error message
      ex - the exception
